abstract: New York City police say worker was critically injured at construction site in on West 17th St in Manhattan, and that he was not wearing safety equipment when he fell into elevator shaft; Buildings Dept says it has opened investigation and full stop-work order on condominium conversion project has been issued.

headline.print_headline: Construction Worker Hurt After 4-Story Fall in the City
headline.main: Manhattan Construction Worker Injured in Fall Down Elevator Shaft

snippet: The man was not wearing safety equipment when he lost his balance at the site on West 17th Street, the New York City Buildings Department said. He was listed in critical condition.
lead_paragraph: The man was not wearing safety equipment when he lost his balance at the site on West 17th Street, the New York City Buildings Department said. He was listed in critical condition.
